Darkfate::

"This is a war for rule all Predacon's faction" said the snake's head 
to scorponok "You're transmetal now, that means that you have three 
transformation levels: Vehical, beast mode and robot... About the 
original Predacons... Honestly I don't sure, but I think that some of 
them are in Megatron side. About situation here... I have to speak 
with Killfest and DRillbit to know current situation... "



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Yeah I do have some questions, why are the both of you predacons 
fighting.
> Also what happend to my body, why do I have a third form? What 
happend to
> the original predacons. and what's the situation with this war? I 
am very
> flattered you feel you can trust me though" Scorponok replied to 
the snake
> head, almost nervously.
